data.name: Aries
data.description: Known for their bold and confident nature, our Aries NFT features a fierce and fiery design that reflects the energy of this sign.

data.name: Taurus
data.description: Representing stability and practicality, our Taurus NFT features a grounded and earthy design that captures the essence of this sign.

data.name: Gemini
data.description: Known for their adaptability and quick wit, our Gemini NFT features a dynamic and dual-toned design that represents the dual nature of this sign.

data.name: Cancer
data.description: Representing emotion and intuition, our Cancer NFT features a delicate and watery design that captures the nurturing and sensitive nature of this sign.

data.name: Leo
data.description: Known for their confidence and creativity, our Leo NFT features a bold and radiant design that reflects the vibrant energy of this sign.

data.name: Virgo
data.description: Representing practicality and attention to detail, our Virgo NFT features a refined and orderly design that embodies the analytical nature of this sign.

data.name: Libra
data.description: Known for their balance and harmony, our Libra NFT features a graceful and harmonious design that captures the diplomatic qualities of this sign.

data.name: Scorpio
data.description: Representing intensity and passion, our Scorpio NFT features a powerful and mysterious design that reflects the intense and transformative nature of this sign.

data.name: Sagittarius
data.description: Known for their adventurous and philosophical nature, our Sagittarius NFT features a bold and expansive design that captures the spirit of exploration and discovery.

data.name: Capricorn
data.description: Representing ambition and discipline, our Capricorn NFT features a strong and structured design that embodies the practical and hardworking qualities of this sign.

data.name: Aquarius
data.description: Known for their unconventional and innovative nature, our Aquarius NFT features a unique and forward-thinking design that reflects the rebellious and visionary qualities of this sign.

data.name: Pisces
data.description: Representing imagination and spirituality, our Pisces NFT features a dreamy and ethereal design that captures the intuitive and artistic nature of this sign.
